explains: n. 启迪，指导，教导；启蒙运动（the Enlightenment）；（佛教）般若，智慧
wordGroup: age of enlightenment 启蒙时代；启蒙时期

sentences.en: His speech gave us some enlightenment.
sentences.cn: 他的发言给我们一些启迪。

sentences.en: The enlightenment of this saying is not lost in our era but unwilling to understand others seems prevalent.
sentences.cn: 这句话的启示不是说在我们的时代遗失，而是不愿理解别人似乎很普遍。
